Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Requires the results of any outage management system stress test conducted in the state by a utility company to be posted online
Summary: Requires the results of any outage management system stress test conducted in the state by a utility company to be posted online and such results to be sent to the temporary president of the senate, the speaker of the assembly and the chairs of the senate and assembly standing committees on energy.
LawCode: Add ยง54, Pub Serv L; add Art 5 Title 1-A ยง1020-mm, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the results of any outage management system stress test conducted in the state by a utility company to be posted online
